General.Name: Northern Superior Resources Inc
General.Description: Northern Superior Resources Inc., an exploration stage junior mining company, engages in the identification, acquisition, evaluation, and exploration of gold properties in Ontario and Québec, Canada. The company also explores for silver and copper. It primary projects include 100% owned Ti-pa-haa-kaa-ning gold property that covering an area of 47,796 hectares located in northwestern Ontario; Croteau Est property situated in west-central Québec; Lac Surprise gold property located in west-central Québec; and the Wapistan mineral property located in Québec. In addition, it holds a 100% interest in the Metson Lake, Rapson Bay, and Thorne Lake properties; Chevrier Gold project located in Québec; October Gold property located in Ontario; Philibert property located in Québec; and Coppermine River property located in Nunavut. The company is headquartered in Sudbury, Canada.
